info.name: Red ROBLOX ( Developed for Non-Mobile ROBLOX ext)
info.description:
This theme was made for the Non-Mobile ROBLOX Extension for chrome. Where to get the extension : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/non-mobile-roblox/hhekopclcdmeiedcjjocmdmcieajgbgc?utm_source=chrome-app-launcher-info-dialog

     ~HungeryColin
info.additionalInfo: 12/19/2015 Development ended at 5:07 PM CWT. | Version 1.1.1. | 1.1.1 Changelog: Seperate chat menus now follow the colors! :D | Instructions : 1. Install. | Made by iChibi/HungeryColin.
